entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.6°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 1.0 km

entry.title: Monday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to rain mixed with snow early this afternoon. Snow inland and over higher terrain. Rainfall amount 5 mm except snowfall amount 2 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain or snow changing to periods of snow this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Monday 16 May 2016
